Edited May 1, 2017 by flywlyx
To provide Source code

Okay, How big is this, How heavy, How much electric does it consume, is it animated?

Also, SQUEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE! Mass Effect! Are you planning on doing the Normandy?
^ It weighs 400T, there's no source code for the plugin or a license though, normally that means it'll get closed for a while.

Yes, I would really like it if you posted the source. Not to accuse or anything, but this does look very similar to my Jump Drive so far - which I don't really mind, but I'd prefer to be credited if you did indeed use any of my code. If not, then I'd like to have a peek at the solutions you came up with to see if maybe I can solve some issues I'm having
Closed source is a no-no and is in violation of Squad's licensing terms. You must provide source.

Yes, you finally made a forum thread. Show the rest of your work, the Normandy etc.. And if you need me to test something again, I'm glad to help.

Now we have three different warp mods:

Mass Relay by flywlyx

The Mass Relay by Molybdene

And the Jump Drive by parameciumkid

Now, who wants to make the hyperdrive from Star Wars? It works without any relay or beacon.

Edited July 15, 2014 by Space Scumbag

Yes, I would really like it if you posted the source. Not to accuse or anything, but this does look very similar to my Jump Drive so far - which I don't really mind, but I'd prefer to be credited if you did indeed use any of my code. If not, then I'd like to have a peek at the solutions you came up with to see if maybe I can solve some issues I'm having

I apologize for not credit you , this thread is not finished yet, I will add instruction ,source code and cerdit later.

And again, really thank you for your code, it really helps me a lot.

Closed source is a no-no and is in violation of Squad's licensing terms. You must provide source.

My apologies, I plan to finish this thread later, so I will upload source code and post download link again.

Thank you for your reminder.

Yes, you finally made a forum thread. Show the rest of your work, the Normandy etc.. And if you need me to test something again, I'm glad to help.

Now we have three different warp mods:

Mass Relay by flywlyx

The Mass Relay by Molybdene

And the Jump Drive by parameciumkid

Now, who wants to make the hyperdrive from Star Wars? It works without any relay or beacon.

I figure out the SR2 is a little oversized, you could modified the rescale factor to 1.2, it will fit the size in the game(216m I think).

I creat a flame effect but it only work once, after you goto space center and return, the effect disappear, I am trying to figure this out.
So how laggy does that huge model makes the game?

So how laggy does that huge model makes the game?

To be honest, it is not the model make the game laggy, it is the emission animation that will decrease your FPS...

Yes 3 Warmods and only 1 working

No 4 if we call KSPI in too (what works natural too)

Edited July 15, 2014 by Xentoe

Yes, you finally made a forum thread. Show the rest of your work, the Normandy etc.. And if you need me to test something again, I'm glad to help.

Now we have three different warp mods:

Mass Relay by flywlyx

The Mass Relay by Molybdene

And the Jump Drive by parameciumkid

Now, who wants to make the hyperdrive from Star Wars? It works without any relay or beacon.

Use Hyperedit to do that if you want that version of hyperdrive.
Or KSP Interstellar.

the geth have reached consensus that this modification should be uploaded to the comprehensive kerbal archive network or ckan for other platforms to download with decreased difficulty

 

Edited April 27, 2017 by mindseyemodels

Is this supposed to be a single part? 400 tonnes is a hell of a payload for a conventional rocket.

Perhaps break this thing down into components that can be docked? I don't believe you'd need discrete docking ports; maybe add docking modules to the parts that only dock to each other. Disable full functionality until all components are assembled.

...just realized the components may or may not have probe cores or reaction wheels of their own. No matter; this is what we have the Klaw for, along with various robotic arms and such in other add-ons.

Edited April 27, 2017 by Gordon Fecyk
How to assemble unintelligent immobile components?
I think it is a single part because breaking up a mesh is super hard(you would need boosters for days)

The reason i say upload it to ckan is that it is the easiest way to download mods ever just click a check box click apply changes then launch the game ckan is the only way i download mods because it is so simple
Does this actually works in 1.2.2?

No, was trying to make a mass effect drive and join them together but never finish the concept. If you are interested, I could have a hot fix this weekend, but didn't know there are still people notice this MOD

And, do you want it takes a huge amount EC to jump? Or a fancy star gate is enough for you?
